description:
The ventriloquist Tengan puts on a show about a ventriloquist who becomes possessed by hiis doll and murders his wife. Tengan falls victim to a genuine split personality disorder, and the personality of his doll appears and orders him to kill his wife Kazuko. Tengan asks Kogoro to watch him so he doesn`t kill his wife Kazuko, who had an affair with his apprentice Togawa, but Kogoro turns him down, saying it`s not his field of expertise. The next morning, Kazuko is found murdered. Tengan confesses that he may have killed his wife while he was unaware, but...
Source: crunchyroll
